originalText.text: Katherine was not only extremely knowledgeable when it came to the credit loan application but she also explained it in a way that was easy for me to understand. You guys need more people like her working at that location!

text.text: Katherine was not only extremely knowledgeable when it came to the credit loan application but she also explained it in a way that was easy for me to understand. You guys need more people like her working at that location!

originalText.text: Do yourself a favor and don't bank here. This bank is one of the most inaccessible, unprofessional banks I've ever had the displeasure of dealing with. They have about 4 employees! terrible hours and randomly decide to not even open on regular business days. It's currently a snowstorm and payday and they've decided to not come in so people could buy necessary supplies. They have 1 atm in the lobby (which is also a daycare LOL) that rarely works. There's been incidents where my account balance has been completely incorrect and They've at one time lost ALL documents and paperwork tying me to my account which prevented me from accessing my funds for several months while they insisted nothing could be done. I finally fixed the problem but only after having to agree to pay them 150 dollars a month. Banks have 2 jobs. Keep your money safe and keep your information safe. This bank has failed at both by misplacng funds and misplacng sensitive information.

You guys need to have a better system when we tell u our SSN. I had to repeat 3 times to her. All in all terrible experience Iâ€™ll still to the location at avenue b. Much better and nicer service.
